examples.title: About Redvolume
examples.body:
The label was set up late 2006, by Mikael Jergefelt, with the simple goal of releasing all kinds of dubstep sounds. Based in Stockholm, there's also a special focus on Scandinavian talents. Check out the discography section to discover quality nordic beats from L-Wiz (Sweden), JSL aka RUF (Denmark) and Tes La Rok (Finland).

Send am e-mail to mike@redvolume.com to get in touch!

examples.title: License music?
examples.body:
We're always open to license music for other projects than our own, just get in touch. We'd love to hear about it!

For sync purposes, licenses can be purchased directly from SyncSquirrel.

Check the discography section to see what we've done so far...

examples.title: Press quotes
examples.body:
L-Wiz - Mojito

An aural beauty is born from the fantastic Redvolume Camp.

Kmag Issue March 2009

Catalogue Part One

Label boss Mikael Jergefelt has been steadily tending to his Scandinavian flock over the past couple of years and nurturing a blossoming imprint.

ATM Magazine Issue 76 2008

Recommended: RVOL004

Redvolume's output has been strong so far, dealing out the filthy and the sublime in equal measures, and this twelve is no different.

iDJ Magazine 2007
